s.text: He's trying to scare us even more.

Uh, sorry I'm being vague, but, and, um, she would read me, um, a lot of Grimm's fairy tales often, and the one I remember most is, um, the one about the, oh what was it, the one with the, hang on a second.

It was, um, actually the story of Hansel and Gretel and they, I think I would like listen to it everyday because I just loved it and they would put it on the record player and, ah, I would sit in a little rocking chair that we had in our living room and listen to it, and I was kind of scared at the part where the witch was going to put them in the oven, but , and my dad would come in and he'd sit with me and comfort me.
